ISSUE.TITLE: docs: error link about nacos deployment tutorial in apisix-seed page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Current State https://apisix.apache.org/docs/apisix/discovery/control-plane-service-discovery/#supported-service-registry If you want to enable control plane Nacos service discovery, please refer to: [Nacos Deployment Tutorial](https://github.com/api7/apisix-seed/blob/main/docs/en/latest/zookeeper.md). it links to the zookeeper deployment tutorial. ### Desired State If you want to enable control plane Nacos service discovery, please refer to: [Nacos Deployment Tutorial](https://github.com/api7/apisix-seed/blob/main/docs/en/latest/nacos.md).
